S08n691:4155: ḍākinyāgamanādīni viśeṣeṇa cihnāni mudrāgṛhe darpaṇādilakṣaṇā eva lakṣaṇam |
S08n691:4156: ebhiriti lakṣante tāni vidhīyante yenāsau paṭalaśceti |
S08n691:4161: sādhako yena jñāyate bhrātā bhaginī na saṃśayaḥ || 1 ||
S08n691:4236: evamiti adhastānnāstīti mudrā pratimudrā guhyachommakā vīrākhyā caturvargalakṣaṇam || 2 ||
S08n691:4254: kāraṇaṃ hṛdayamiti kvacit pāṭhe hṛdayamiti kāraṇam |
S08n691:4318: adanā dantā daro danta iti ca samam |
S08n691:4324: [ nāvaṃ pravāha iti pravāhākhyā ] paśu mṛgā iti |
S08n691:4335: chagala eva chāgalaḥ sa ca naraḥ |
S08n691:4369: itaḥ paraṃ mudrā pratimudrā ca nāmni chommakāśca na santītyarthaḥ || 2 ||
S08n691:4370: ḍākinī ca tathā lāmā khaṇḍarohā ca rupiṇī |
S08n691:4371: catvāro vargāsteṣāṃ sarvasaṅketabhāṣā chommakā ḍā iti puruṣaḥ smṛta ityādayasta evādibhūtā yasya varṇādisamūhaḥ,
S08n691:4373: tadeva vidhīyata iti vidhiryeṣā navānāṃ paṭalānāṃ te caturvargasarvasaṅketabhāṣāchommakādi vidhayaḥ |
S08n691:4384: pūrvamuddhṛto mūlamantraḥ kīdṛśaḥ kimarthañca gopita iti svayaṃ kṛtāyāṃ praśnāśaṅkāyāmathaśabdaḥ |
S08n691:4387: kasyārthe gopitā ityāha - sarvathā'rtheṣu viṣayeṣu kāma icchā yasya sa tathā |
S08n691:4397: sa hi svadamaśamamātrārthitvāddhīnādhimuktiḥ kutīrthyānāmajñānaṃ tatra cittaṃ buddhistadarthena |
S08n691:4399: tatra vīrairyoginībhiḥ spaṣṭābhibhāṣito mantrastvayam - om namo bhagavate vīreśāya |
S08n691:4407: kara kara kuru kuru bandha bandha trāsaya trāsaya kṣobhaya kṣobhaya hrauṃ hrauṃ hraḥ hraḥ pheṃ pheṃ phaṭ phaṭ daha daha paca paca bhakṣa bhakṣa vasarudhirāntramālāvalambine grihṇa grihṇa saptapātālagatabhujaṅgaṃ sarpaṃ vā tarjaya tarjaya ākaḍḍha ākaḍḍha hrīṃ hrīṃ jñauṃ jñauṃ ( jṇauṃ jṇauṃ )
S08n691:4408: kṣmāṃ kṣmāṃ hāṃ hāṃ hīṃ hīṃ hūṃ hūṃ kili kili sili sili hili hili dhili dhili hū hū phaṭ || 2 ||
S08n691:4411: eta ityaṣṭapadāḥ gopitā iti kuto jñāyata ityāha - spaṣṭā ityādi |
S08n691:4419: mūlamantrasya sarvātmā mūlamantrasarvātmā tasya gopyaṃ gopanam |
S08n691:4421: uddhāre hyekaikākṣaragopaḥ tad vidhīyate yena yatra vā sa cāsau paṭalaśceti mūlamantrasarvagopyavidhipaṭalaḥ |
